title: Poster, "Art Director's Club, Cincinnati Art Museum", 1994
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, lower left edge, vertically (sideways, facing inward): Design: Paul Rand
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink, down center: Paul/ Rand/ Art/ Directors/ Club/ of/ Cincinnati/ Art/ Museum/ May/ 17/ 1994/ 7-8/ pm; imprinted vertically, lower left edge (after signature): • Printing: The Hennegan Company • Paper:Excellence 100 lb. Dull Text by Repap. A #1 recycled sheet containing 50% total recycled content with 10% post-consumer fibre. Available from Nationwide Papers.
description: On white ground, imprinted in red, yellow, and green, upper edge, center, a striped umbrella.  Imprinted in black ink,down center, from upper to lower edge, Paul Rand, title, date, and time of exhibition.  Imprinted in red, lower edge, center, two boots (heels facing inward).  Left shoe, green laces, and yellow bottom, and right shoe reversed.  Imprinted in black ink, along lower left edge, vertically, printer's name and type of paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Art Director's Club, Cincinnati Art Museum", 1994.
1994. Offset lithograph on white paper. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-13.
